description:
Salt pans along the BCLME (Angola, Namibia, South africa) coast.
Angola: Digitised from GeoCover orthorectified Landsat ETM mosaics, supporting material : 1:100K topographic maps and Google Earth images 2007.
Namibia: Digitised from colour orthophotos Surveyor General (2001 - 2002), Landsat ETM mosaic (1999 - 2002) and old topographic maps .
South Africa:Expert input; Existing data bases (Western Cape Wetlands Inventory/ Avian Demography Unit Sample Sites); 1:50 000 topomaps; Online data accessed and extracted from available information supplied by SA National Parks, Provincial Nature Conservation, and the Department of Water Affairs & Foresty. Data requested and compiled for the BCLME project by Taniia Strauss, February to September 2006, small changes to attribute table by Vera De Cauwer
name: BCLME: Salt pans along the coast
